original_text: and you shall keep it until the fourteenth day of this month, when the whole assembly of the congregation of Israel shall kill their lambs at twilight.
korean_text: 이 달 열나흗날까지 간직하였다가 해 질 때에 이스라엘 회중이 그 양을 잡고

sentences.original_text: until the fourteenth day of this month,
when the whole assembly of the congregation of Israel
shall kill their lambs at twilight.
sentences.korean_translation: 황혼 때에 그 어린 양들을 잡을 것이니라.
